additional_info:
Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, pass-through, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 Appartment For Rent.
A Modern, Stylish apartment in Newly-erected Building on a quiet area of Krtsanisi. With a great view! Fully equipped and furnished, next to Embassy of Switzerland on Krtsanisi Street. The apartment is bright, airy, and beautifully decorated. With Panoramic Elevator that descends to the parking lot.
1 Living room, 1 Studio Kitchen with “FRANKE” appliances , 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with “Villeroy & Boch” and “HANSA” appliances, 2 balconies, Internet, Cable-TV, Central Heating System, A/C, Parking Place.
